Articles.Content:
I've been working on a series detailing the adventures of Bill Kerman, a forgetful and impulsive, albeit brilliant engineer and pilot.  It started as mostly mission videos with some narrative, and has gradually evolved into more complete narratives.  I hope you enjoy, and would appreciate any feedback.  One does not have to start at the beginning, and I do feel as the videos have improved as the series has progressed.

The Installments so far:

The Odyssey by Bill: 25 Ton Manned Grand Tour- All Landings- Stock KSP v1.05

The Odyssey by Bill, Book 2: To The Mun On 4.8 Tons

The Odyssey By Bill, Book 3: Tiny 4.8 Ton SSTO

The Odyssey by Bill, Book 4: Single Stage Unrefueled Grand Tour (No Landings)

The Odyssey by Bill, Book 5: Single Stage to Tylo

The Odyssey by Bill, Book 6: An Even Tinier, 2.1 ton SSTO

The Odyssey by Bill, Book 7: Bill Kerman Spacelines; 228 Kerbals to Minmus

The Odyssey by Bill, Book 8: Bill Goes to the Mun For Less Than Zero Funds

The Odyssey by Bill, Book 9: 564 Kerbals Single Stage to Laythe

Edited February 14, 2016 by EvermoreAlpaca
Amazing grand tour! Another "Kaddesh" Needleship, OMG!
Updates continue, as Bill begins some commercial endeavours.  Links added to the original post.
